channel.title: Website on Yarra Framework
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Yarra Framework

item.title: New Website for Yarra
item.description: We finally managed to create a new website for the Yarra framework and hope to provide more up-to-date information on Yarra going forward. Currently, we are still in the process of migrating some remaining content from our old website, but this should be completed soon. For reference, the old website is still available under this link. Note, however, that the old website will not be updated anymore, so that the information provided there can be outdated.
